text: And you have a record company behind it, this is a key too, you need people to fight for your records, at least a little bit. So if you have a great song, it's catchy, and you've got a little bit of help, I think that's all you need. But there hasn't been that in music.
author: Joan Jett

text: Def Leppard is obviously a different band that we are, but the music work well tighter. And the audiences seem work well together too. We are opening, but we're having a good time.
author: Joan Jett

text: I like music that's more offensive. I like it to sound like nails on a blackboard, get me wild.
author: Iggy Pop

text: I like to hang out with my friends. I love music. I like to go to the movies. I like to eat. I like to cook.
author: Joan Jett

text: I plan to stay in music. I plan to keep making records.
author: Joan Jett
